item.title: Trading WRX
item.description: BTC shows the main direction of cryptocurrency market. It has break MA10 and currently in a congression. It’s good time to buy in during pullback. WRX will be the trade target. Middle term trading purpose: gaining tokens. Order: ticker Action Date comment WRX Buy 0.1045 2020/3/20 - WRX Sell 0.11298 2020/3/20 Miss the best sell point, so sell when pullback WRX Buy 0.
